Greeting.Title: Hi!
Greeting.Content: Welcome to Dopamine, we think you'll love it! First, let's set things up.

Appearance.Title: Appearance
Appearance.Content: What should your Dopamine look like?

Music.Title: Music
Music.Content: Let's now set up your collection. Where do you store your music?

Donate.Title: Donate
Donate.Content: If you like Dopamine, please consider donating. You can donate right now, or later in the 'About' screen. Thank you!

Done.Title: Done!
Done.Content: All done. Let's now start up Dopamine.

DialogTexts.ConfirmDeleteFolder: Are you sure you want to delete the folder '{{folderPath}}'?

ErrorTexts.DeleteFolderError: An error occurred while deleting the folder. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.AddFolderError: An error occurred while adding the folder. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.GlobalError: An error has occurred which will cause the application to close. Please verify the log if you need more information.
